Introduction

Kota (코타) is a South Korean singer currently under BOD Entertainment and MY Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group Sunny Hill.

Following Sunny Hill's change of labels to Nega Network in 2010, the agency announced Kota would be joining the group as a new member.

She made her official debut as a member of the group on June 9, 2011 with the mini album Midnight Circus.
